Translations.Text: By those that wrest violently
by those that draw out quickly
by those that glide serenely
by those that race to the fore, outstripping
and by those that govern affairs
on the Day when the quaker quakes
and the successor follows upon it
Hearts that Day shall tremble
with eyes humbled
They will say, “Are we to be restored as we were before
What! When we have become decayed bones?”
They say, “This, then, would be a ruinous return!”
Yet it shall be but a single cry
then, behold, they will be upon a wide expanse
Hast thou heard tell of Moses
when his Lord called out to him in the holy valley of ?uwa
“Go unto Pharaoh! Truly he has rebelled
And say, ‘Dost thou wish to be purified
and that I guide thee to thy Lord that thou mightest have fear?’”
Then he showed him the greatest sign
But he denied and disobeyed
Then turned his back, moving swiftly
Then he gathered and proclaimed
and said, “I am your lord most high.”
So God seized him with a punishment exemplary in the Hereafter and in this world
Truly in that is a lesson for whosoever fears
